sentences: Arbuus on suurte söödavate viljadega taim.
Söime arbuusi ja see oli väga hea.
Mulle meeldib arbuusi süüa kuumal ilmal.
translation: large edible-fruited plant with trailing vines
context: The word 'suurte' appears to be part of the Estonian phrase describing watermelon as a large edible-fruited plant with trailing vines. In this context, it's likely an inflected form (partitive plural) of the adjective 'suur' meaning 'large' or 'big', modifying the noun 'viljad' (fruits).
